Cook smarter with ReciMe! 

ReciMe is the #1 app to collect & organize recipes from Instagram, TikTok, Facebook, Pinterest, recipe websites & more!

🔑 ReciMe Key Features:
✨ Import Recipes from Websites, Instagram, Pinterest, TikTok - Download recipes from your favorite websites and social media sites. The ingredients and method steps are saved in a neat format.
✨ Scan Recipes from Cookbooks - Take a picture of a recipe from a cookbook or upload a picture of a recipe from your photo album.
✨ Upload recipes from anywhere - Save your favorite recipes from your existing apps like Paprika, Notes app, Google Docs, Notion, Evernote and more! Or add your own recipes.
✨ Access across multiple devices - iOS and iPad using our mobile app, or any web browser through the ReciMe web app
✨ Family Recipes - Digitize your family recipes for future generations. Save recipes privately or publicly.
✨ Search by Ingredients - Find recipes to cook using ingredients in your fridge or pantry. Filter for recipes by a single ingredient, or multiple ingredients. Save yourself another trip to the supermarket and reduce your food waste too!
✨ Grocery Lists - Create smart grocery lists to shop faster! Sort ingredients to shop by supermarket aisle or by recipe.
✨ Create Cookbooks - Organize your recipes into cookbooks. Customize recipes by meal type (breakfast, lunch, dinner), cuisine, diet and more!
✨ Cloud sync - All recipes are saved on the cloud.
✨ Adjust ingredients - Scale ingredients to your desired serving size.
✨ Convert measurements - Change recipe measurements between standard and metric
✨ Cook with ease - Keep your phone screen unlocked while you cook. Follow recipes step-by-step so you can focus in the kitchen.
✨ Share - Share recipes with your friends and family. Or send via email, SMS, WhatsApp, Messenger or AirDrop.

💻 How To Use
💫 Click the “Add to Chrome” button and pin it to the toolbar.
💫 Log in to your account.
💫 On any page with a recipe, click on the ReciMe icon to download.
💫 That's it! From there, you can edit the recipe, organize it into cookbooks, and add it to your meal plans and grocery lists/ 

🗣️ FAQ
📌 Is it free to use?
-Yes, we offer limited use for free. For unlimited access, you can upgrade to ReciMe Plus Subscription
📌 Is my ReciMe Plus Subscription active on both the mobile and ReciMe Chrome Extension version?
-Yes! Just make sure you log into the ReciMe account associated with your Plus subscription
📌 Can I use your service on my phone?
-Yes. ReciMe is available to download for iOS (Android coming soon). Search up “ReciMe” in the App Store to download now.
